definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
in the past always/for a long time now/until now
ever since a long time ago

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，我曾帮助过一位纳粹集中营幸存者。

sentences.english: Chinese people has never regarded human beings as the hightest creature among everything else since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族自古以来从来不把人看作高于一切。

sentences.english: This is one of the best novellas I've read in a long time.
sentences.chinese: 这是我长期以来读过的最优秀的中篇小说之一。

sentences.english: Russia has long wished to keep the West away from its backyard.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯长久以来都渴望让西方国家远离他的后院。

sentences.english: Since 2002 she has drowned herself in the study of American literature.
sentences.chinese: 从2002年以来她一直埋头研究美国文学。

sentences.english: All along the disease is considered to be caused by abnormal swim bladders.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，该病都被认为是由鱼鳔异常引起的。

sentences.english: Not now, not since I bumped into him again.
sentences.chinese: 现在没有，从我再次撞见他以来都没有。

sentences.english: We have lived in Linqing since we came here.
sentences.chinese: 自从我们到这儿以来，我们就一直住在临清。

sentences.english: Indeed, pain and itch have been difficult to separate.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，疼痛和瘙痒一直以来都很难分开。

sentences.english: Europeanization is the output of language contact between the English and Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 汉语的欧化现象是鸦片战争以来英汉语言接触的产物。

sentences.english: He’s perhaps the most well-known painter from all of the 20:th century.
sentences.chinese: 他或许是近一个世纪以来最负盛名的艺术家。

sentences.english: Since 2003, the Tourism-based Country Strategy has been established and implemented in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 自2003年以来，日本确立并实施了观光立国战略。

sentences.english: It's been non-stop football for me since I started when I was 17.
sentences.chinese: 自从我17岁参加正式比赛以来还从未停过工。

sentences.english: Since its founding, has received more than 400 foreign students trained people.
sentences.chinese: 建校以来，先后接受培养了外国留学生400余人。

sentences.english: I haven’t met Wang Ying since last year.
sentences.chinese: 自去年以来我就未遇见过王英。

sentences.english: My family has watch over the emperor's tombs for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 几个世纪以来，我们的家族都在皇陵守护着。
